dependencies.description:
Collectively, the bedtools utilities are a swiss-army knife of tools for
a wide-range of genomics analysis tasks. The most widely-used tools
enable genome arithmetic: that is, set theory on the genome.
dependencies.name: bedtools2

dependencies.description:
The NVIDIA HPC SDK is a comprehensive suite of compilers, libraries and
tools essential to maximizing developer productivity and the performance
and portability of HPC applications. The NVIDIA HPC SDK C, C++, and
Fortran compilers support GPU acceleration of HPC modeling and
simulation applications with standard C++ and Fortran, OpenACC
directives, and CUDA. GPU-accelerated math libraries maximize
performance on common HPC algorithms, and optimized communications
libraries enable standards-based multi-GPU and scalable systems
programming. Performance profiling and debugging tools simplify porting
and optimization of HPC applications.
dependencies.name: cxx

dependencies.description: The Cython compiler for writing C extensions for the Python language.
dependencies.name: py-cython

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.
dependencies.name: py-pandas

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: A python module for reading, manipulating and writing genomic data sets.
dependencies.name: py-pysam

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description: IsoQuant: Transcript discovery and quantification with long RNA reads
dependent_to.name: isoquant

dependent_to.description:
ldsc is a command line tool for estimating heritability and genetic
correlation from GWAS summary statistics. ldsc also computes LD scores
dependent_to.name: ldsc

dependent_to.description:
An accurate and integrative structural-variant caller for next
generation sequencing
dependent_to.name: py-metasv

dependent_to.description: Sequence Elements Enrichment Analysis (SEER), python implementation
dependent_to.name: py-pyseer

description: Python wrapper -- and more -- for Aaron Quinlan's BEDTools
name: py-pybedtools

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
